name: Nothing Is Worth The Risk (Scinacz)
description:
This game is based on mandela catalouge, and depends on time.

Estimated play time 2 minutes. (its just the alpha), a pixel 3d horror game.

The dialouge text changes depending on the time.

EVERYTHING is interactable.

CONTROLS:
-wasd
-mouse right button (INTERACT)
-F (FLASHLIGHT)
